description: This file contains React components for accessible tab toggles, specifically a toggle between 'Preview' and 'Code', and nested tabs for 'HTML' and 'JS' code views, used in a UI demo context.

methods.name: TabToggle({ value, onChange, idBase = 'preview-code' })
methods.description: A React functional component providing a toggle between 'Preview' and 'Code' with accessibility features.

methods.name: CodeTabs({ html, js, renderBlock, idBase = 'code-tabs' })
methods.description: A React functional component that manages sub-tabs for HTML and JS code views, including rendering logic and accessibility attributes.

ctags.name: CodeTabs
ctags.pattern: /^export function CodeTabs({ html, js, renderBlock, idBase = 'code-tabs' }) {$/
